title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the comprehensive requirements for the AIProjectManager, including desired features, integrations, target users, performance expectations, security considerations, and scalability needs. Conduct stakeholder interviews, market research, and analyze existing project management tools to identify gaps and opportunities.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the AI components, project management features, data storage, and integration points. Consider scalability, maintainability, performance requirements, security, and ease of deployment. Define the high-level components, their responsibilities, communication patterns, and data flows between them. Identify potential risks and mitigation strategies. Propose a technology stack and justify the choices.

title: Develop AI Components
description: Implement the AI components for planning, resource allocation, risk assessment, and progress tracking.

title: Develop Project Management Features
description: Implement the project management features, such as task management, Gantt charts, and reporting.

title: Set up Data Storage and Integration
description: Design and implement the data storage solution and integrate with existing project management tools.

title: Implement Security and Access Control
description: Develop security measures and access control mechanisms to protect user data and project information.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deployment of the application.

title: Develop Test Suite and Quality Assurance
description: Create a comprehensive test suite and implement quality assurance processes for the AIProjectManager.
dependencies: Set up Data Storage and Integration

title: Write Documentation and User Guides
description: Prepare documentation, user guides, and training materials for the AIProjectManager.
dependencies: Set up Data Storage and Integration
